Essentials.Title: Essentials

titles.noIssuesToShow: There are no issues to show.

generic.label: An unexpected error occurred.
generic.sub: Refresh the page and try again.

licensing.label: Unable to obtain a license for {user}.
licensing.sub: Verify that you have a license available.

synchronize.title: Sync with Issue Management
synchronize.timeout: You need Issue Management to be opened to synchronize both applications.
synchronize.tooltip: Synchronize filters from Issue Management to Issue 3D Review.

tooltips.helper: Click to display the help for Issue 3D Review.

defaultFilterForAll.title: If all filters are unselected, the displayed issues should match your current:

preferences.validation: Add a validation process for new issues to enforce the approval or rejection of the promotion of an issue once it has been analyzed or reviewed.
preferences.stream: Use simplified geometry as default geometry stream

notifications.dropPreventedForInspection: You cannot drop object(s) while an inspection is running.
notifications.serverError: An error occurred, please refresh your page and retry.
notifications.serverWarning: Server operations are in progress for these objects. Please try again later.
notifications.commandAlreadyProcessing: This command is already processing, please wait.
notifications.cannotRelocateBalloon: This balloon cannot be relocated, please check your responsibilities.
notifications.notValidReportedAgainst: This is not a valid Affected Items. Please select another object.
notifications.noFocusedViewWhenColorized: The Focused View will not be displayed when Colorize is activated in the 6WTags.
notifications.noSupportedReportedAgainstData: Data attached to 'Affected Items' of issue {name} is not supported inside this app.
notifications.noReportedAgainstData: No data is attached to 'Affected Items' of Issue {name}.

inspect.title: Inspecting {number} issue(s)
inspect.withContextTooltip: Show the context of the inspected issue. Only one issue must be inspected.
inspect.switchRelatedTooltip: Switch the affected items with the resolved items (or vice-versa). Only one issue must be inspected.
inspect.inspectNotAvailable: Please inspect only one issue to load the context.
inspect.noContext: No DMU Context to be loaded.
inspect.noResolvedItemsForSwitch: No Resolved Items to be loaded.
inspect.relocate: Do you want to reposition this marker?

selectIn3D.pickUpFrom3DApplication: Pick up existing 3D object from compatible 3D application
selectIn3D.pickUpOccurrenceFrom3DApplication: Select in 3D application on which path issue should be applicable

largeData: Extra-large data visualization is not supported in Issue3DReview
transitionRejectedInV2: Due to an upgrade of 3DNavigate, transition is temporarily impossible. As a bypass, you can pin the new widget created, and use WidgetLink to bind it to any other widget of the dashboard. See documentation for more details about WidgetLink.
caAsResolvedBy: New Change Action as Resolved By
syncFilterMsg: Filters successfully Synchronized with Issue Management.
syncShortMsg: Filters from the Issue Management app are not yet applied. Refresh to synchronize and apply those filters here.
